channel.title: Need coder. All DECENT coders look here!
channel.description:
Alright, All decent coders use this form if you want to help me...If you actually help throughout the server history you will be CO-OWNER.
Please use this form... [code] [b]Why you want to code this server:[/b][i]YOUR ANSWER[/i] [b]How many servers have you coded:[/b][i]YOUR ANSWER[/i] [b]If you have coded a server what was the source:[/b][i]YOUR ANSWER[/i] [b]What server source you would like to code(must not be laggy)[/b][i]YOUR ANSWER[/i] [b]Could your reduce lag sufficently on the source/server?:[/b][i]YOUR ANSWER[/i] [b]Would you say you are a good coder?:[/b][i]YOUR ANSWER[/i] [b]Any questions you have...[/b][i]YOUR QUESTIONS[/i][/code]

item.title: Need coder. All DECENT coders look here!
item.dc:creator: @ryan123 ryan123
item.description:
@ryan123 wrote:

Zenzi: Fill out form, Im sure you’ll be accepted…=-]
N0va: Your not what im looking for…sorry…
Soalreaver: ACCEPTED…So…by your sig im geussing Lost island is your source…I’ll try it…=-]…And ive owned 2 servers and people said they were good…[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 05:08:16 PM[/size][hr]Zenzie your accepted…because you just great like that

Read full topic

item.title: Need coder. All DECENT coders look here!
item.dc:creator: @soalreaver soalreaver
item.description:
@soalreaver wrote:

packman u cant code for shit… just like a week or 2 ago u wer askin me how to add npc’s… and u edited each source for like an hour lol[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 16:19:24[/size][hr]Why you want to code this server:Coz im bored of my own now lol
How many servers have you coded:[i]Tescape, Soalscape and my client lol, all long term/i]
If you have coded a server what was the source:Tescape, pimpscape, Soalscape
What server source you would like to code(must not be laggy)I would like to use Lost island but hay lol, tescape i gues, no lagg, pimpscape MABEY but there boaring
Could your reduce lag sufficently on the source/server?:Yes… i redused lad BUT A LOAD on my server yrty made it much better
Would you say you are a good coder?:Im not the best… but look at my work and see
Any questions you have…yes… are u any good lol

Read full topic

item.title: Need coder. All DECENT coders look here!
item.dc:creator: @n0vamage n0vamage
item.description:
@n0vamage wrote:

Why you want to code this server:get coding xp and help people
How many servers have you coded:three including metal-scape pk and ive helped the owner of pkscape code
If you have coded a server what was the source:pimp and test
What server source you would like to code(must not be laggy)i could help you fix beards add global objects, add commands to emote list, basically do all i can
Could your reduce lag sufficently on the source/server?:i might be able to sort it out
Would you say you are a good coder?:i wouldent say im the best but i know my way around java
Any questions you have…none
